be set up so each station will know when to expect the program*
They will be allowed several days leeway in which to schedule
the program. If a station decides not to broadcast the show,
or if it cannot be fitted into the schedule the tape will be
sent on to the next station at the end of the allotted time*
It was announced by this head^arters that some of
the earlier series would be offered to those stations not included
in the initial distribution* This is still a firm intent. It has
been due to the mechanical limitations of our recording service
that this has not been done* As soon as facilities allow, some
of the earlier series will be reissued*
There are a number of programs that are currently in
varying stages of negotiation and consideration. Those mentioned
above or shown in the following tables are all the series on which
definite action is in progress*
The first table summarizes the pertinent data on all
of the standard series that have been offered* The second table
summarizes the three dated series that have been circulated*
